thig1.5:1.1: Tissā, diventa tutt'uno con il Dhamma, [yuñjeti is related to yoga. Rather than exertion, I think it suggests that there are wholesome attachments that we need to develop during the path: attachment to Dhamma. Simile of the raft.
thig1.5:1.2: do not let the slightest time be wasted. / do not let even a moment pass you by. / waste no time.
thig1.5:1.3: Those who have let the opportunity pass feel sorrow, // Quelli che perdono tempo sono destinati a soffrire, consegnati all'inferno.
